SEARCH
Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.util

Class Palette<T>

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.knet.api.util.Palette<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of object being mapped to an integer.
public class Palette<T> extends Object
Maps objects to integers, allowing for smaller packet sizes when the same objects are referenced multiple times.

    • keyFor

      public int keyFor(@NotNull T obj)
      Gets or associates an integer key for the given object.

      This functions by first checking if the object already has an associated key, and returning that if so. If the object does not have an associated key, a new integer key is created for the object and placed in the association maps for future use.

      Note: this method is not thread-safe. Key-association should only be performed on a single thread during payload creation.

      Parameters:
      obj - the object to get the integer key for.
      Returns:
      the integer key for the given object.

    • asCodec

      public net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf,T> asCodec(String errorName)
      Gets this palette as a codec that automatically converts object to/from keys.
      Parameters:
      errorName - the name that will be in the resulting error if a missing key is decoded.
      Returns:
      this palette as a stream codec.
